title: Glimpses of Western India
creator_credit: S.N.S Sastry, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: Bombay and the sights to see nearby; Malabar Hill and the hanging gardens; the eight century Hindu cave temples of Elephanta island; Nasik and its pilgrims; Aurangabad the Mogul City; tombs of mediaeval kings; the Ellora caves; cave frescoes at Aguiba; the landscape and the life of the people.
